channel.title: Glean API Deprecations
channel.description: Deprecated endpoints, fields, and parameters in Glean's APIs

item.title: Deprecation: uploadId field on POST /api/index/v1/indexdocuments
item.description:
The uploadId field is deprecated. Use batchId for tracking bulk uploads.

Removal date: 2027-04-15

item.title: Deprecation: trackingToken field on POST /api/v1/autocomplete
item.description:
The trackingToken field is deprecated. Use requestId instead for request tracking.

Removal date: 2027-04-15

item.title: Deprecation: category enum-value on POST /api/v1/feed
item.description:
The ALL category is deprecated. Use MIXED to retrieve all feed types.

Removal date: 2027-01-15

item.title: Deprecation: timeoutMillis field on POST /api/v1/chat
item.description:
The timeoutMillis field is deprecated. Use requestOptions.timeout instead.

Removal date: 2027-01-15

item.title: Deprecation: saveChat field on POST /api/v1/chat
item.description:
The saveChat field is deprecated. Use chatPersistence instead.

Removal date: 2027-01-15

item.title: Deprecation: version field on POST /api/index/v1/indexdocument
item.description:
The version field is deprecated. Use document.metadata.version for optimistic concurrency control.

Removal date: 2026-10-15

item.title: Deprecation: clusterType enum-value on POST /api/v1/search
item.description:
The NONE cluster type is deprecated. Omit the clusterType field instead.

Removal date: 2026-10-15

item.title: Deprecation: disableSpellcheck field on POST /api/v1/search
item.description:
The disableSpellcheck field is deprecated. Use requestOptions.spellcheckMode instead.

Removal date: 2026-07-15
